channel.title: CVE Feed for BlueStacks -- BlueStacks App Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlueStacks -- BlueStacks App Player

item.title: CVE-2018-0701|2024-08-05T03:35:48.999Z -- bluestacks -- bluestacks%20app%20player
item.description: BlueStacks App Player (BlueStacks App Player for Windows 3.0.0 to 4.31.55, BlueStacks App Player for macOS 2.0.0 and later) allows an attacker on the same network segment to bypass access restriction to gain unauthorized access.
